page.title: 09Children's Games in Wendover
page.content:
Marbles are the craze again Children crowd around a drain. Bulging bags are at their side Coloured marbles of every size.
Roller skates are fun to don. Once on board you'll have good fun. A friend will pull and help you glide Around the pavements you totter and slide. You learn to roll along on skates No need to cling on garden gates. Safe in the warm on the floor you relax And hold in your palm a fine set of jax Bounce up the ball, just pick up one, Throw up all five and catch-Well done! Summer and Winter we join with friends And play childhood games until daylight ends.
